---

This wicked-looking curved weapon is a _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)_ that draws power from defeating foes, either to bolster itself or its wielder. A _heartripper blade_ is well suited for use in any ritual that involves divination, and incorporating it into any ritual with the [divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47) trait grants the wielder a +1 item bonus on any check made to resolve the effects of the ritual's casting.
